## BaseConfigurationSpec interface

Augments the CLI spec to add all pure runtime properties, that can be defined through the configuration file only

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseConfigurationSpec extends BaseCLIConfigurationSpec 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseCLIConfigurationSpec](./kassette.basecliconfigurationspec.md)
